jti.description: Unique identifier; can be used to prevent the JWT from being replayed (allows a token to be used only once)

iss.description: Thumbprint of the JWK in the cnf parameter of the Wallet Attestation

aud.description: An URI value that identifies the recipient that the JWT is intended for; it MUST be set to the URI of the PID/EAA Provider

iat.description: The UNIX Timestamp at which the JWT was issued; can be used to determine age of the JWT

exp.description: The UNIX Timestamp after which the JWT expire

credential_hash.description: Contain the hash value of a Digital Credential, derived by computing the base64url encoded hash of the Digital Credential.

credential_hash_alg.description: Contain the Algorithm used for hashing the Digital Credential
